original_text: In the days of Shamgar the son of Anath, in the days of Jael, the highways were unoccupied, and the travellers walked through byways.
korean_text: 아낫의 아들 삼갈의 날에 또는 야엘의 날에는 대로가 비었고 길의 행인들은 오솔길로 다녔도다

sentences.original_text: In the days of Shamgar the son of Anath,
and the travellers walked through byways.
